name: BB-8
description: Fancy spinning droid that belongs to Poe Dameron.

name: Poe Dameron
description: Owner of BB-8. Also flys things.

name: Leia Organa/Skywalker/Solo
description: Wife to Han, sister to Luke. She also runs things.

name: Finn
description: Janitor that likes to play with lightsabers.

name: Rey
description: Scavenger with force powers. Daughter of somebody important.

name: Luke Skywalker
description: Jedi and reigning hide and go seek champion.

name: Darth Vader
description: Angry dad that ruined it for everybody.

name: Emperor
description: Bad jedi dude with a power complex.

name: Kylo Ren
description: Upset for not being picked in the jedi soccer league.

name: Captain Phasma
description: Head stormtrooper & all chromed out like an episode of Pimp My Ride.

name: R2-D2
description: Quirky little droid with a knack for getting into trouble.

name: Boba Fett
description: Intimidating with his armor and wears a jet pack.

name: IG-88
description: Droid that likes to use guns.
